Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits the sale of mature and violent video games to minors
Summary: Prohibits the sale to minors of any video game that has a mature or violent rating.
LawCode: Add ยง391-w, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting sale of certain video games to minors
